title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 33.4 - Commissioner's use of equipment and personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 33.4 - Commissioner's use of equipment and personnel

State Regulations

Upon the request of the commissioner or any authorized
representative of the department, each county or town superintendent shall make
such equipment as is requested, and operators for such equipment, available to
the department for use in the cleanup and removal of petroleum
discharges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
33.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
